events.name: text
events.string: Hah, you're finally dead!

events.name: text
events.string: Now your soul belongs to me zebra!

events.name: text
events.string: You and the rest of libGDX will be punished

events.name: text
events.string: for the many misdeeds in your lives.

events.name: text
events.string: Centuries of pure torment!

events.name: text
events.string: Hah hah hah!

events.name: text
events.string: The trouble is that I don't have any evidence.

events.name: text
events.string: Let's make a deal.

events.name: text
events.string: For each crime:

events.name: text
events.string: If you snitch on your friend,

events.name: text
events.string: your friend must serve 5 years of torment

events.name: text
events.string: and you will serve none.

events.name: text
events.string: If your friend snitches on you,

events.name: text
events.string: you will serve 5 years

events.name: text
events.string: and they will serve none.

events.name: text
events.string: If you both try to snitch on each other,

events.name: text
events.string: I know you're lying and you both get 3 years.

events.name: text
events.string: If neither of you say anything,

events.name: text
events.string: I will be forced to punish both of you for 2 years.

events.name: text
events.string: I've made a helpful chart so you can understand!

events.name: text
events.string: Now now.

events.name: text
events.string: I'm not going to let you talk to your friends.

events.name: text
events.string: No.

events.name: text
events.string: That would be cheating.

events.name: text
events.string: Complete isolation!

events.name: text
events.string: But you're a smart programmer.

events.name: text
events.string: I’m sure you’ve already worked out an algorithm

events.name: text
events.string: to minimize your torment.

events.name: text
events.string: The trouble is, so have your friends.

events.name: text
events.string: Can you trust your friends?

events.name: text
events.string: Or will they rat you out?

events.name: text
events.string: Whaddya say?
